#id=1
#text=Yesterday I rode a public bus to go to work .
#id=2
#text=I woke up early because the bus is very very very unreliable .
#id=3
#text=I packed the items that I needed for the day in my backpack .
#id=4
#text=I double checked to make sure I had everything , including my one dollar and twenty five cents bus fare .
#id=5
#text=I walked out the door and started heading in the direction of the bus stop .
#id=6
#text=I walked to the bus stop as quickly as I could and then waited for the bus .
#id=7
#text=I waited about ten and a half minutes before the bus came .
#id=8
#text=When the bus arrived I got on and paid my fare , and sat down .
#id=9
#text=During the bus ride I listened to music to avoid hearing the loud noise of the bus motor and the other noises caused by the large number of people around me .
#text=Finally when I arrived at the destination I got off .
